detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long metal earrings decorated with glass beads and resin pendants. Length 9.5 cm.
Trousers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Press-studs at the top and crotch and short legs with narrow ribbed trims.

Dress in a patterned modal weave with a round neckline that has gathers at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a print motif, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Chunky boots in imitation leather and pile with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with long sleeves, a lined, wrapover front and concealed zip in the side. Elasticated seam at the waist and a lined skirt.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in a stretch weave. Lace trims around the neckline and sleeves and down the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Headband in soft, rib-knit chenille with a knot detail at the front and gathers at the back.
Hobo bag in grained imitation leather with a handle and drawstring at the top, and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Unlined. Size 16x30x30 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Glittery shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow imitation leather shoulder strap and a flap with a star-shaped appliqué and concealed hook and loop fastening. Lined. Size 3.5x10x14 cm.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Maxi dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top, and ties at the waist. Short sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Joggers in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and a detachable, lined hood with a fastening at the front. Discreet, zipped handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining in recycled polyester.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a seam at the waist and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Sandals in imitation leather with covered platform soles and heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 13.5 cm.

Leather weekend bag with a zip and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Two handles, one with a detachable address tag and tabs with press-studs at the sides to adjust the size of the bag. One outer compartment, one zipped inner compartment and studs on the base. Lined. Size approx. 22x26x47 cm.
Earrings in metal decorated with faceted plastic stones at the top and fabric tassels at the bottom. Length 15 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in washed stretch cotton twill with fabric appliqués, a print motif, and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Metal rings in various designs. Half of the rings are decorated with sparkly stones.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Wide Alice band covered in pleated jersey with a decorative knot at the top.

Short jacket in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a drawstring and frill trim.
Short shorts in sturdy denim with a high, elasticated waist with a frill trim. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shirt in a cotton weave with embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved playsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with gentle draping at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam and a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, and diagonal side pockets.
Trainers in mesh with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Oversized pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline and low dropped shoulders. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, and gently tapered legs.
Satin sandals with a wrapover top and ankle strap that is elasticated at the back. Imitation patent leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.

Thong body in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, a lined gusset with press-studs, and a string back.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and a straight, ribbed hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ears on the top and a ribbed hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and a flounce with overlocked edges on the sleeves.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Large metal earrings with tear-shaped plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.
Chino shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Block-coloured socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed, fold-down shaft.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Long-sleeved top with a tie-front hem. Matching skinny leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
A-line dress in airy seersucker with covered elastication at the top and shoulder straps with decorative ties.

Adjustable, shimmering on-ear headphones with a padded headband. Integral volume limiter set at 85 dB to protect your child’s hearing. Suitable for mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 3.
Sun hat in cotton canvas with ties under the chin. Cotton lining. Width of brim 4 cm.
Imitation suede loafers with imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with a collar with ties and a button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill-trimmed shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and a gently flared, lined skirt.
Calf-length dress in viscose crêpe with a V-neck. Short sleeves with a small opening and ties at the hems, buttons down the front and two slits at the hem. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and a detachable fabric belt with a metal fastener.
Cap in cotton jersey with elastication at the back.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress woven in a linen blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck. Buttons at the front, a seam at the waist and side pockets. Partly lined.
Shorts in superstretch twill with a high waist, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket and hood with an elastic drawstring. Long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
